thread.section_title: Eclipse Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eclipse Travel | www.eclipsetravel.com.au
thread.title: Dr David grant
thread.title_full: Eclipse Travel reviewed by Dr David grant

author: Dr David grant
title: Dr David grant
text: I have generally always organised our holidays myself or through a travel agent who is a friend and travelled with us.However for our trip to to Antartica with some time in South America and in particular Patagonia I realised I would have to rely on others and Shae from Eclipse travel sure didn't disappoint ! She gave valuable and reliable advice on all parts of our trip and where I didn't take her advice regarding more time in Patagonia and less in Santiago we came to regret that and it was the only slight cloud on a memorable and enjoyable time away
